00020 namespace CALICE {
00021   
00022   DeepAnalysisProcessor DeepAnalysisProcessor;
00023   
00024   /********************************************************************************/
00025   /*                                                                              */
00026   /* constructor                                                                  */
00027   /*                                                                              */
00028   /********************************************************************************/
00029   DeepAnalysisProcessor::DeepAnalysisProcessor(): Processor("DeepAnalysisProcessor"){
00030     _description = "This processor performs clustering a la Vassilly.";
00031     _inputCollectionNames.clear();
00032     _inputCollectionNames.push_back("CalorimeterHits"); //AhcCalorimeterHits
00033     registerProcessorParameter("HitCollectionName",
00034                                "Name of the Calorimeter hit collection",
00035                                _inputCollectionNames,
00036                                _inputCollectionNames);
00037 
00038     registerProcessorParameter("ClusterCollectionName", 
00039                                "Name of the Cluster collection",
00040                                _outputCollectionName,
00041                                std::string("AhcClusters"));
00042 
00043     registerProcessorParameter("NeutrClusterCollectionName", 
00044                                "Name of the neutral Cluster collection",
00045                                _outputNeutrCollectionName,
00046                                std::string("AhcNeutrClusters"));
00047 
00048 
00049     _colNamesModuleConnection.clear();
00050     _colNamesModuleConnection.push_back("ModuleConnection");
00051     registerProcessorParameter("ModuleConnectionCollectionName", 
00052                                "Name of the conditions data collection which describes the connection between modules and the DAQ front-ends (folder /CaliceEcal/module_connection)",
00053                                _colNamesModuleConnection,
00054                                _colNamesModuleConnection);
00055 
00056     _colNamesModuleLocation.clear();
00057     _colNamesModuleLocation.push_back("ModuleLocation");
00058     registerProcessorParameter("ModuleLocationCollectionName", 
00059                                "Name of the conditions data collection which contains the description of the module location (folder /CaliceEcal/module_location)",
00060                                _colNamesModuleLocation,
00061                                _colNamesModuleLocation);
00062 
00063     _colNamesModuleDescription.clear();
00064     _colNamesModuleDescription.push_back("ModuleDescription");
00065     registerProcessorParameter("ModuleDescriptionCollectionName", 
00066                                "Name of the conditions data collection which contains the description of the module location (folder /CaliceEcal/module_description)",
00067                                _colNamesModuleDescription,
00068                                _colNamesModuleDescription);
00069 
00070     registerProcessorParameter("ViewMapping", 
00071                                "View the mapping between channels and modules when ever the module location or module connection conditions data change (set to 0 or !=0)",
00072                                _viewConnectionTree,
00073                                0);
00074 
00075     _samplingFractionA.clear();
00076     _samplingFractionA.push_back(28.62);//29.5
00077     registerProcessorParameter("SamplingFractionA" ,
00078                                "first part of parametrisation of the sampling fraction." , 
00079                                _samplingFractionA,
00080                                _samplingFractionA);
00081 
00082     _samplingFractionB.clear();
00083     _samplingFractionB.push_back(0.);//0.78
00084     registerProcessorParameter("SamplingFractionB" ,
00085                                "second part of parametrisation of the sampling fraction." , 
00086                                _samplingFractionB, 
00087                                _samplingFractionB);
00088     
00089     _thresholds.clear();
00090     _thresholds.push_back(0.4);
00091     _thresholds.push_back(0.5);
00092     _thresholds.push_back(2.0);
00093     _thresholds.push_back(4.0);
00094     registerProcessorParameter("Thresholds",
00095                                "Thresholds to be put into deep analysis algorithm.",
00096                                _thresholds,
00097                                _thresholds);
00098 
00099     registerProcessorParameter("mipThreshold" ,
00100                                "Minimal energy deposition in units of MIP to keep hit (default 0.5)" , 
00101                                _mipThreshold,
00102                                (double) 0.5);
00103 
00104     registerProcessorParameter("switchRotation",
00105                                "Switch rotation (from Calice to Deep Analysis coordinates) ON (1-default) and OFF (0)",
00106                                _switchRotation,
00107                                (int) 1);
00108 
00109     registerProcessorParameter("kevFactor",
00110                                "Factor (in GeV) for transforming E[GeV] in E[MIP], default value 875 keV",
00111                                _samplingFactor,
00112                                (double) 0.000875);
00113   }
00114 
00115   /********************************************************************************/
00116   /*                                                                              */
00117   /* initialize                                                                   */
00118   /*                                                                              */
00119   /********************************************************************************/
00120   void DeepAnalysisProcessor::init() {
00121 
00122     std::stringstream message;
00123     message << "DeepAnalysisProcessor: undefined conditions data: ";
00124     bool error = false;
00125   
00126     if (_inputCollectionNames.size() != _colNamesModuleConnection.size()) {
00127       throw std::runtime_error("DeepAnalysisProcessor::init: For each hit collection name "
00128                                "mapping conditions data is required.");
00129     }                
00130     if (_inputCollectionNames.size() != _colNamesModuleLocation.size()) {
00131       throw std::runtime_error("DeepAnalysisProcessor::init: For each hit collection name "
00132                                "module location conditions data is required.");
00133     }                  
00134     if (_inputCollectionNames.size() != _colNamesModuleDescription.size()) {
00135       throw std::runtime_error("DeepAnalysisProcessor::init: For each hit collection name "
00136                                "module description conditions data is required.");
00137     }
00138     if (_inputCollectionNames.size() != _samplingFractionA.size()) {
00139       throw std::runtime_error("DeepAnalysisProcessor::init: For each hit collection name "
00140                                "a first part of the sampling fraction paramterisation is required.");
00141     }
00142     if (_inputCollectionNames.size() != _samplingFractionB.size()) {
00143       throw std::runtime_error("DeepAnalysisProcessor::init: For each hit collection name "
00144                                "a second part of the sampling fraction parametrisation is required.");                          
00145     }
00146   
00147     for (unsigned detectorIndex = 0; detectorIndex<_inputCollectionNames.size(); detectorIndex++) {
00148       _moduleTypeChange.push_back(MultipleConditionsChangeDelegator<DeepAnalysisProcessor>(this, &DeepAnalysisProcessor::moduleTypeChanged, detectorIndex));
00149       _moduleLocationChange.push_back(MultipleConditionsChangeDelegator<DeepAnalysisProcessor>(this, &DeepAnalysisProcessor::moduleLocationChanged, detectorIndex));
00150       _moduleConnectionChange.push_back(MultipleConditionsChangeDelegator<DeepAnalysisProcessor>(this, &DeepAnalysisProcessor::moduleConnectionChanged, detectorIndex));                                                                                                                                   
00151     }
00152   
00153     for (unsigned detectorIndex = 0; detectorIndex<_inputCollectionNames.size(); detectorIndex++) {
00154       if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &(_moduleLocationChange[detectorIndex])
00155                                                                 ,_colNamesModuleLocation[detectorIndex])) {
00156         message << " " << _colNamesModuleLocation[detectorIndex];
00157         error=true;
00158       }
00159       if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &(_moduleConnectionChange[detectorIndex]),
00160                                                                 _colNamesModuleConnection[detectorIndex])) {
00161         message << " " << _colNamesModuleConnection[detectorIndex];
00162         error=true;
00163       }
00164       if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &(_moduleTypeChange[detectorIndex]),
00165                                                                 _colNamesModuleDescription[detectorIndex]) ) {
00166         message << " " << _colNamesModuleDescription[detectorIndex];
00167         error=true;
00168       }
00169     }  
00170     if (error) { 
00171       message <<  ".";
00172       throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00173     }
00174     _mapping.resize(_inputCollectionNames.size());
00175     for (unsigned detectorIndex = 0; detectorIndex < _inputCollectionNames.size(); detectorIndex++) {
00176       _mapping[detectorIndex].init();
00177       _mapping[detectorIndex].setViewConnectionTree(_viewConnectionTree!=0);
00178     }
00179   
00180     if (_thresholds.size() != 4) {
00181       throw std::runtime_error("DeepAnalysisProcessor::init: Exactly four thresholds are required.");
00182     }
00183 
00184     printParameters();
00185   }
00186 
00187   /********************************************************************************/
00188   /*                                                                              */
00189   /* processRunHeader                                                             */
00190   /* (to be called once per Run)                                                  */
00191   /*                                                                              */
00192   /********************************************************************************/
00193   void DeepAnalysisProcessor::processRunHeader(LCRunHeader* run) 
00194   {
00195     RunInformation runInfo(run);
00196     _fIsMC = runInfo.isMC();
00197 
00198     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"is MC: "<<runInfo.isMC()<<endl;
00199 
00200 
00201   }
00202 
00203   /********************************************************************************/
00204   /*                                                                              */
00205   /* processEvent                                                                 */
00206   /* (to be called in every event)                                                */
00207   /*                                                                              */
00208   /********************************************************************************/
00209   void DeepAnalysisProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent* evt) {
00210 #ifdef CLUSTERING_DEBUG
00211     std::cout<<"\n\n\n runNumber="<<evt->getRunNumber()<<"  eventNumber="<<evt->getEventNumber()<<endl;
00212 #endif
00213 
00214     DeepAnalysis deepAnalysis;
00215 
00216     //  Set thresholds for the reconstruction
00217     //            The trick here is: 
00218     //  Low _thresholds[0] will allow us to increase an efficiency 
00219     //  to MIP registration;  it was put as low as normal 0.5-0.1=0.4[MIPs]
00220     //  Neutron_thresh was increased by 0.1 =0.6[MIPs]
00221     //  to better kill noise in the neutron signal 
00222     deepAnalysis.detector.normal_thresh = _thresholds[1];    //0.5
00223     deepAnalysis.detector.neut_thresh   = _thresholds[1] + 0.1;//0.6
00224 
00225 
00226     try {
00227       std::vector<LCCollection*> col_hits; //contains input hits collections (for every detector: HCAL, ECAL etc)
00228       std::vector<unsigned> detector_hits; //contains the number of input hits collections
00229       std::vector<unsigned> start_hits;    //contains the number of hits per input collection per event
00230 
00231       //accept only beam events in case of DATA
00232       const TriggerBits trigBits(evt->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_TRIGGER_EVENT));
00233 
00234       if (_fIsMC == false)/*DATA!*/
00235         if (!trigBits.isBeamTrigger()) return;
00236 
00237       //if (_fIsMC == false && !trigBits.isBeamTrigger()) return;
00238 
00239         unsigned hitIndex = 0;//counter for the total number of hits in a collection (per event)
00240         //(relevant only if there are more than 1 input collections)
00241         //--------------------------------------------------
00242         //loop over all input collections
00243         for (unsigned detectorIndex = 0; detectorIndex < _inputCollectionNames.size(); detectorIndex++) {
00244           LCCollection* aHitCol = evt->getCollection(_inputCollectionNames[detectorIndex]); 
00245           col_hits.push_back(aHitCol);
00246           start_hits.push_back(hitIndex);
00247  
00248       
00249 #ifdef CLUSTERING_DEBUG
00250           std::cout << "filling hits for clustering" << std::endl;
00251           std::cout << detectorIndex << " " << aHitCol->getNumberOfElements() << std::endl;
00252 #endif      
00253 
00254           //loop over all elements in the input collection
00255           for (int element_i = 0; element_i < aHitCol->getNumberOfElements(); element_i++) {
00256             CalorimeterHit *a_hit = dynamic_cast<CalorimeterHit *>(aHitCol->getElementAt(element_i));
00257       
00258             //--------------------------------------------------
00259             // Classify the hits according to their energy:
00260             // E < _threshold[0]=0.4 -> disregard hit
00261             //   ( _threshold[1]=0.5)
00262             // E < _threshold[2]=2.0 -> TRK (track)
00263             // E < _threshold[3]=4.0 -> HAD (hadronic)
00264             // E > _threshold[3]=4.0 -> EM (electromagnetic)
00265             //--------------------------------------------------
00266             DeepAnalysis::KIND type = DeepAnalysis::KIND_COUNT;
00267             if (a_hit->getEnergy() < _thresholds[0]) //0.4
00268               continue;
00269             else if (a_hit->getEnergy() < _thresholds[2])//2.0
00270               type = DeepAnalysis::TRK;
00271             else if (a_hit->getEnergy() < _thresholds[3])//2.0
00272               type = DeepAnalysis::HAD;
00273             else
00274               type = DeepAnalysis::EM;
00275 
00276             //------------------------------------------------------------  
00277             // Note on the coordinate system:
00278             // The coordinate system used in DeepAnalysis is different from
00279             // the one used in Calice. The relations are:
00280             // x_deepAnalysis = -x_calice
00281             // y_deepAnalysis = y_calice
00282             // z_deepAnalysis = -z_calice         
00283 
00284             // double x_calice = a_hit->getPosition()[0];
00285             // double y_calice = a_hit->getPosition()[1];
00286             // double z_calice = a_hit->getPosition()[2];
00287           
00288             // double x_deepAnalysis = -x_calice;
00289             // double y_deepAnalysis = y_calice;
00290             // double z_deepAnalysis = -z_calice; 
00291 
00292             //rotate to the Calice coordinates, if requested
00293             std::vector<float> position = this->GetRotatedPositionIfRquested(_switchRotation, a_hit);
00294 
00295             //------------------------------------------------------------
00296             // Give the tagged hits to the DeepAnalysis to be 
00297             // reconstructed:
00298             // deepAnalysis.add_hit(x,y,z, ampl_gev, ampl_mip, layer, type)
00299             // where: x,y,z    = the space coordinate of the hit
00300             //        ampl_gev = the energy amplitude of one hit, in GeV
00301             //        ampl_mip = the energy amplitude of one hit, in number of MIPs
00302             //        type     = a pre-assigned hit type (according to the energy)
00303             //        layer    = the layer in which the hitted cell is found
00304             deepAnalysis.add_hit(position.at(0), //x
00305                                  position.at(1), //y
00306                                  position.at(2), //z
00307                                  a_hit->getEnergy()*GeVperMip(detectorIndex, 
00308                                                               CellIndex(a_hit->getCellID0()).getLayerIndex()),
00309                                  a_hit->getEnergy(),
00310                                  _mipThreshold,
00311                                  PopulatedLayerIndex(detectorIndex,CellIndex(a_hit->getCellID0()).getLayerIndex()),
00312                                  type,
00313                                  element_i);
00314               
00315 #ifdef CLUSTERING_DEBUG
00316             cout<<"initial x="<<a_hit->getPosition()[0]<<"  y="<<a_hit->getPosition()[1]
00317                 <<"  z="<<a_hit->getPosition()[2]<<endl;
00318             cout<<"deepAnalysis.add_hit(x="<<position.at(0)<<", y="<<position.at(1)<<" , z="<<position.at(2)
00319                 <<"  E(GeV)="
00320                 <<a_hit->getEnergy()*GeVperMip(detectorIndex, CellIndex(a_hit->getCellID0()).getLayerIndex())
00321                 <<"  E(MIPs)="<<a_hit->getEnergy()
00322                 <<" type="<<type<<endl;
00323 #endif
00324               
00325 
00326             //fill the vector detector_hits with the number of input collection of hits
00327             detector_hits.push_back(detectorIndex);                           
00328             hitIndex++;
00329 
00330           }//end loop over element_i
00331         }//end loop over detector_index
00332 
00333         //-------------------------------------------------
00334         // call the main routine of the DeepAnalysis code,
00335         // i.e. start reconstruction         
00336         deepAnalysis.reconstruction();
00337         //-------------------------------------------------
00338         unsigned int had_ncl  = 0;
00339         unsigned int had_nhit = 0;
00340         double had_engySum    = 0;
00341         deepAnalysis.color_clusters_stat(DeepAnalysis::HAD,had_ncl,had_nhit,had_engySum);
00342 #ifdef CLUSTERING_DEBUG
00343         cout<<"had_ncl="<<had_ncl<<" had_nhit="<<had_nhit<<" had_engySum="<<had_engySum<<endl;
00344 #endif
00345         unsigned int elm_ncl  = 0;
00346         unsigned int elm_nhit = 0;
00347         double elm_engySum    = 0;
00348         deepAnalysis.color_clusters_stat(DeepAnalysis::EM,elm_ncl,elm_nhit,elm_engySum);
00349 #ifdef CLUSTERING_DEBUG
00350         cout<<"elm_ncl="<<elm_ncl<<" elm_nhit="<<elm_nhit<<" elm_engySum="<<elm_engySum<<endl;
00351 #endif
00352 
00353         unsigned int trk_ncl  = 0;
00354         unsigned int trk_nhit = 0;
00355         double trk_engySum    = 0;
00356         deepAnalysis.color_clusters_stat(DeepAnalysis::TRK,trk_ncl,trk_nhit,trk_engySum);
00357 #ifdef CLUSTERING_DEBUG
00358         cout<<"trk_ncl="<<trk_ncl<<" trk_nhit="<<trk_nhit<<" trk_engySum="<<trk_engySum<<endl;
00359 #endif
00360 
00361 
00362 
00363         LCCollection* col_cluster = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::CLUSTER); 
00364         //----------------------------------------------
00365         //loop over reconstructed clusters (ELM-, TRK- and HAD-like)
00366         for (RSIterator<DeepAnalysis::Cluster> clusterIterator(deepAnalysis.clusters); 
00367              clusterIterator.next();) {
00368 
00369           ClusterImpl *a_cluster = new ClusterImpl;
00370           a_cluster->setEnergy(clusterIterator->energySum);//ws=sum of energy
00371           float pos_deepAnalysis[3];
00372           pos_deepAnalysis[0] = clusterIterator->centerOfGravity.x;//s=center of gravity
00373           pos_deepAnalysis[1] = clusterIterator->centerOfGravity.y;
00374           pos_deepAnalysis[2] = clusterIterator->centerOfGravity.z;
00375         
00376         
00377           //rotate back to the Calice system of coordinates
00378           float pos_calice[3];
00379           pos_calice[0] = -pos_deepAnalysis[0];
00380           pos_calice[1] = pos_deepAnalysis[1];
00381           pos_calice[2] = -pos_deepAnalysis[2];
00382 
00383           if (_switchRotation == 1) {
00384             a_cluster->setPosition(pos_calice);
00385           } else if (_switchRotation == 0){
00386             a_cluster->setPosition(pos_deepAnalysis);
00387           }
00388           float pos_err[3];
00389           pos_err[0] = 0.;
00390           pos_err[1] = 0.;
00391           pos_err[2] = 0.;
00392           a_cluster->setPositionError(pos_err);
00393 
00394           if (clusterIterator->col==DeepAnalysis::EM)  a_cluster->setTypeBit(CLUSTER_EM);
00395           if (clusterIterator->col==DeepAnalysis::TRK) a_cluster->setTypeBit(CLUSTER_TRK);
00396           if (clusterIterator->col==DeepAnalysis::HAD) a_cluster->setTypeBit(CLUSTER_HAD);
00397          
00398 #ifdef CLUSTERING_DEBUG
00399           std::cout << "found new cluster " << clusterIterator->energySum<< " " 
00400                     << clusterIterator->centerOfGravity.x << " "
00401                     << clusterIterator->centerOfGravity.y << " " 
00402                     << clusterIterator->centerOfGravity.z 
00403                     << std::endl;
00404 #endif
00405 
00406           //----------------------------------------------
00407           //loop over hits
00408 #ifdef CLUSTERING_DEBUG
00409           int countIt = 0;
00410 #endif
00411           for (RSIterator<DeepAnalysis::Hit> hitIterator(&clusterIterator); hitIterator.next();) {
00412 #ifdef CLUSTERING_DEBUG
00413             std::cout << " hit: " << detector_hits[hitIterator->idx] << " " 
00414                       << start_hits[detector_hits[hitIterator->idx]] << " " << hitIterator->idx << std::endl;
00415 #endif      
00416             //a_cluster->addHit(static_cast<CalorimeterHit*>(col_hits[detector_hits[hitIterator->idx]]->getElementAt(hitIterator->idx - start_hits[detector_hits[hitIterator->idx]])), 1.);
00417             int hitIdx  = hitIterator->idx; //hit index
00418             int collIdx = detector_hits[hitIdx];//number of input hits collection (0=first, 1=second, etc)
00419             CalorimeterHit *hit = 
00420               static_cast<CalorimeterHit*>(col_hits[collIdx]->getElementAt(hitIdx - start_hits[collIdx]));
00421             float contribution = 1.;
00422             a_cluster->addHit(hit, contribution);
00423             
00424 #ifdef CLUSTERING_DEBUG
00425             double engy = hit->getEnergy();
00426             countIt++;
00427             std::cout<<"hitIdx="<<hitIdx<<"  collIdx="<<collIdx<<" start_hits[collIdx]="<<start_hits[collIdx]
00428                      <<"  countIt="<<countIt<<"  ampl="<<engy<<std::endl;
00429 #endif
00430           }//end loop over RSIterator
00431 
00432 #ifdef CLUSTERING_DEBUG
00433             if (a_cluster->getType() >> CLUSTER_EM == 1) 
00434               std::cout<<"EM noHits = "<<(a_cluster->getCalorimeterHits()).size()<<std::endl;
00435             else if (a_cluster->getType() >> CLUSTER_TRK == 1) 
00436               std::cout<<"TRK noHits = "<<(a_cluster->getCalorimeterHits()).size()<<std::endl;
00437             else if (a_cluster->getType() >> CLUSTER_HAD == 1) 
00438               std::cout<<"HAD noHits = "<<(a_cluster->getCalorimeterHits()).size()<<std::endl;
00439 #endif
00440           //----------------------------------------------
00441           col_cluster->addElement(a_cluster);
00442         }//end loop over clusters
00443 
00444         evt->addCollection(col_cluster, _outputCollectionName);
00445 
00446 
00447         //============================================================================================
00448         //============================================================================================
00449         //============================================================================================
00450         LCCollectionVec *neutrHitsCol = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT);
00451         //Neutral clusters are just isolated hits
00452         int noNeutrHits=0;
00453         double neutrEngySum=0;
00454         for (RSIterator<DeepAnalysis::Hit> isolHitIterator(deepAnalysis.neutrons); isolHitIterator.next(); ){
00455           noNeutrHits++;
00456           
00457           CalorimeterHitImpl *anIsolatedHit = new CalorimeterHitImpl;
00458           double engy = isolHitIterator->amplGeV;
00459           anIsolatedHit->setEnergy(engy);
00460           
00461           //===================================================
00462           //FIXME: need to consider the case with more than 1 input collection?
00463           //int isolHitIdx = isolHitIterator->idx;
00464           //int collIdx    = detector_hits[isolHitIdx];
00465           //===================================================
00466           neutrHitsCol->addElement(anIsolatedHit);
00467 
00468           neutrEngySum += engy;
00469         }
00470 #ifdef CLUSTERING_DEBUG
00471         std::cout<<"neutrHitsCol noOfElements: "<<neutrHitsCol->getNumberOfElements()
00472                  <<"  noNeutrHits="<<noNeutrHits<<"  neutrEngySum="<<neutrEngySum
00473                  <<std::endl;
00474 #endif
00475         evt->addCollection(neutrHitsCol, _outputNeutrCollectionName);
00476 
00477         //============================================================================================
00478         //============================================================================================
00479         //============================================================================================
00480 
00481     }//end of try()
00482     catch (lcio::DataNotAvailableException err) {}
00483   }
00484 
00485   /********************************************************************************/
00486   /*                                                                              */
00487   /* GeVperMip                                                                    */
00488   /*                                                                              */
00489   /********************************************************************************/
00490   double DeepAnalysisProcessor::GeVperMip(unsigned detectorIndex, unsigned layerIndex) {
00491     return (_gevPerMip[detectorIndex])[layerIndex];
00492   }
00493 
00494   /********************************************************************************/
00495   /*                                                                              */
00496   /* PopulatedLayerIndex                                                          */
00497   /*                                                                              */
00498   /********************************************************************************/
00499   unsigned DeepAnalysisProcessor::PopulatedLayerIndex(unsigned detectorIndex, unsigned layerIndex) {
00500     return (_populatedLayerIndex[detectorIndex])[layerIndex];
00501   }
00502 
00503   /********************************************************************************/
00504   /*                                                                              */
00505   /* updateCorrelations                                                           */
00506   /*                                                                              */
00507   /********************************************************************************/
00508   void DeepAnalysisProcessor::updateCorrelations() {
00509 
00510     int populatedLayer = 0;
00511   
00512     std::vector<std::vector<unsigned> > layerOccupation;
00513     layerOccupation.resize(_inputCollectionNames.size());
00514     _gevPerMip.resize(_inputCollectionNames.size());
00515     _populatedLayerIndex.resize(_inputCollectionNames.size());
00516 
00517     for (unsigned detectorIndex = 0; detectorIndex < _inputCollectionNames.size(); detectorIndex++) {
00518       for (unsigned moduleIndex = 0; moduleIndex < _mapping[detectorIndex].getNModules(); moduleIndex++) {
00519         unsigned layerIndex = 
00520           CellIndex(_mapping[detectorIndex].getGeometricalCellIndex(moduleIndex, 0)).getLayerIndex();
00521 
00522         if (layerIndex + 1 > layerOccupation[detectorIndex].size()) {
00523           layerOccupation[detectorIndex].resize(layerIndex+1);
00524         }       
00525 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00526         std::cout << "DeepAnalysisProcessor::updateCorrelations: found layer " 
00527                   << layerIndex << " in detector " << detectorIndex << std::endl;
00528 #endif
00529         (layerOccupation[detectorIndex])[layerIndex]++;
00530       }
00531 
00532       _populatedLayerIndex[detectorIndex].clear();
00533       _gevPerMip[detectorIndex].clear();
00534       for (unsigned layer = 0; layer < layerOccupation[detectorIndex].size(); layer++) {
00535         if (!(layerOccupation[detectorIndex])[layer]) {
00536           _populatedLayerIndex[detectorIndex].push_back(-1);
00537           _gevPerMip[detectorIndex].push_back(0.);
00538         }
00539         else {
00540           _populatedLayerIndex[detectorIndex].push_back(populatedLayer);
00541           int i;
00542           for (i = layer-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00543             if ((_populatedLayerIndex[detectorIndex])[i]>=0) break;
00544           }
00545           if (layer==0)
00546             _gevPerMip[detectorIndex].push_back(_samplingFractionA[detectorIndex] * _samplingFactor);
00547           else 
00548             _gevPerMip[detectorIndex].push_back(_samplingFractionA[detectorIndex]*
00549                                                 (1+_samplingFractionB[detectorIndex]*(layer-i-1))
00550                                                 *_samplingFactor);     
00551           populatedLayer++;
00552         }
00553       }
00554 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00555       std::cout << "DeepAnalysisProcessor::updateCorrelations: results for detector " 
00556                 << detectorIndex << " :" << std::endl;
00557 
00558       for (int layer = 0; layer < _populatedLayerIndex[detectorIndex].size(); layer++) {
00559         if ((_populatedLayerIndex[detectorIndex])[layer] >= 0) {
00560           std::cout << " " << layer << ": " << (_populatedLayerIndex[detectorIndex])[layer] 
00561                     << "/" << (_gevPerMip[detectorIndex])[layer] << std::endl;
00562         }
00563       }
00564       std::cout << std::endl;
00565 #endif      
00566     }  
00567   }
00568 
00569   /********************************************************************************/
00570   /*                                                                              */
00571   /* check                                                                        */
00572   /*                                                                              */
00573   /********************************************************************************/
00574   void DeepAnalysisProcessor::check(LCEvent* evt) {}
00575   
00576   /********************************************************************************/
00577   /*                                                                              */
00578   /* rotateCoordinates                                                            */
00579   /*                                                                              */
00580   /********************************************************************************/
00581   std::vector<float> DeepAnalysisProcessor::GetRotatedPositionIfRquested(bool switchRotation, 
00582                                                                          CalorimeterHit* a_hit) 
00583   {    
00584     float x_calice = a_hit->getPosition()[0];
00585     float y_calice = a_hit->getPosition()[1];
00586     float z_calice = a_hit->getPosition()[2];
00587     
00588     float x_deepAnalysis = -x_calice;
00589     float y_deepAnalysis = y_calice;
00590     float z_deepAnalysis = -z_calice; 
00591     
00592     std::vector<float> position(3,0); //vector for storing x, y and z of the particle
00593     
00594     if (switchRotation == 1){
00595       position.at(0) = x_deepAnalysis;
00596       position.at(1) = y_deepAnalysis;
00597       position.at(2) = z_deepAnalysis;
00598     } else if (switchRotation == 0){
00599       position.at(0) = x_calice;
00600       position.at(1) = y_calice;
00601       position.at(2) = z_calice;
00602     }
00603     
00604     //double finalZ = position.at(2);
00605     //std::cout<<"initial z: "<<a_hit->getPosition()[2]<<" final z: "<<finalZ<<std::endl;
00606     return position;
00607   }
00608   
00609   /********************************************************************************/
00610   /*                                                                              */
00611   /* end                                                                          */
00612   /*                                                                              */
00613   /********************************************************************************/
00614   void DeepAnalysisProcessor::end() {}
00615   
00616 }
